channel.title: If Auxy goes Dubstep

this is one of my dubstep playlists, id auxy goes dubstep auxy should have all the little tools to creating songs like these. I think it would be fantastic to be able to create something like this in an app.

item.title: If Auxy goes Dubstep
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
If we ever get any kind of decimator effect we will be able to bro step anything. I’ve literally seen a trumpet sample turn into a dubstep/brostep bass. I need less wub more GROWL more THROAT. Just my two pence and wishful thinking

Read full topic

item.title: If Auxy goes Dubstep
item.dc:creator: Kerfuffle
item.description:
I would love a dubstep pack, personally. started listening in 2009, first introduced with Canadian dubstep pioneer Excision. A lot of the sounds we hear in dubstep music can be made actually in Auxy, it’s all about experimenting with layers and automation. If you ever learned from tutorials on how to make Dubstep in a wavetable Oscillator, you would know how to cut sounds up to get relatively close to the womps and growls you hear often.

I have tons of experimental drops i have never really continued, but i have a few i was geared towards pumping out. 2009-2010 Style Dubstep
Trappy-dubstep drop from a BTC
Very Hybrid-(before of my understanding of how to layer properly)
First Dubstep that worked

A lot of my music takes influence from bass driven music, even if it’s not a dubstep track (EI Electro House) so you will hear a lot of (hopefully) unique sound design that harnesses the full extent of what auxy can push out.

Read full topic

item.title: If Auxy goes Dubstep
item.dc:creator: Xicon
item.description:
The Auxy community is about to go into the Dubstep age. I can tell.

Read full topic

item.title: If Auxy goes Dubstep
item.dc:creator: El1011
item.description:
I’d like a dubstep pack, I’ve done a few tracks with it (mostly WIP’s tho)

There’s plenty of ways to do sounds, but my biggest problem is the drums. Most aren’t “punchy” enough (imo) to be used without lots of layering & stuff (which takes up track # space)

Read full topic

item.title: If Auxy goes Dubstep
item.dc:creator: Michael_Raskin
item.description:
nice. i like your fisrt one a lot.
my new BTC is kind of dubstep at the end. lol

its just you and i cant compare to the debstep songs in my playlist. i wish we had the resources in auxy to do what they do.

Read full topic
